History
-------

0.2.1 (2011-06-15)
++++++++++++++++++
- fix pypi package: add missing MANIFEST.in and add missing packages to
  setup.py.


0.2.0 (2012-06-14)
++++++++++++++++++

- add support for built-in constants and classes.
- strip annotations from unused remembered names the are re-used in synonyms
